#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)

#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define N 300011
#define LN 21
using namespace std;
double spe[N],dist[N];
int n,k;
double eps = 1e-9;
double calc(double tim){
 int i;
   double maxd = 0;
   double mind = 1e12 ;
   for(i=0;i<n;++i){
     double pos = dist[i]+spe[i]*tim;
     maxd = max(maxd,pos);
     mind = min(mind,pos);
   }
   return maxd-mind;
}
int main()
{
   int i,j;
   cin>>n>>k;

   double maxd , mind ,ans;
   maxd = LONG_LONG_MIN;
   mind = LONG_LONG_MAX;
   ans = LONG_LONG_MAX;
   for(i=0;i<n;++i){
    cin>>spe[i]>>dist[i];
    maxd = max(maxd,dist[i]);
    mind = min(mind,dist[i]);
   }
   ans = maxd - mind;
   double lo = 0;
   double hi = k;
   while(hi-lo>=eps){
       double m1 = lo + (hi-lo)/3;
       double m2 = lo + 2*(hi-lo)/3;
       double an1 = calc(m1);
       double an2 = calc(m2);

       ans = min(ans,an1);
       ans= min(ans,an2);
       if(an1>an2){
         lo = m1+eps;
       }
       else if(an2>an1){
           hi = m2-eps;
       }
       else{
        lo = m1+eps;
        hi = m2-eps;
       }
   }

   printf("%0.6lf\n",ans);
return 0;
}
